Cybernetics.Name: Healing Nanomachines
Cybernetics.Description: Upon being injured, your body will release nanomachines to help close the wound. <color=green>+HP Regen</color>

Cybernetics.Name: Adrenal Nanomachines
Cybernetics.Description: Your blood is filled with nanomachines that aid in removing fatigue from muscles. <color=green>+ST Regen</color>

Cybernetics.Name: Radiation Scrubber
Cybernetics.Description: Slowly removes radiation from your body.

Cybernetics.Name: Target Sensor
Cybernetics.Description: Your eyes are able to accurately predict a target's movement. <color=green>+ACC</color>

Cybernetics.Name: Impact Sole
Cybernetics.Description: Cushion under the soles of your feet, reducing the amount of sound you make.
